JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Production staff for Industry-Slaughterhouse / DKK 169,- per  hour ( 22.72 EUR per hour ). Permanent job.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For larger, modern Slaughterhouse, we are looking for a number of additional employees as they have expanded their production facilities.

If you are several people who want to drive to and from work together, the Company takes this into account in their planning.

Working hours are from kl. 06:00 to 14.00 Monday to Friday. There will be an opportunity to get evening work later in the year, when this team is started up.

The primary task is the boning of pigs.

Location is between Billund and Vejle. About 100 km from the German / Danish border.

Start-up: Ongoing over the next 6-7 weeks.

 

Mandatory requirements:

You have experience with knife work. Either from the slaughterhouse of cloven-hoofed animals, chickens or fish.

You speak, read and understand either Danish, English or Polish. This is because all safety regulations are in these 3 languages.

 

Apply for one of the jobs:

Interested in one of these jobs, send a CV to skrivop@jobteam.dk

Write "Knife work" in the subject field.

If you are several people who want to drive together, write it in the email, and we will take this into account in the hiring process.

If you do NOT have experience with knife work, please do not apply.
